main.name: Colliders
main.description:
`Colliders` contains all the Collider logic, like collider constructors and collision checks, provided by a Colliders plugin. Checkout plugins at `src/plugins/Colliders` or `docs/plugins` on how to make a plugin.

> __Note:__ All arguments to functions are required, unless marked as *Optional*.

children.name: Response
children.description: The main Response constructor. See `Colliders.test()` for more information.

children.name: test
children.description: Test for a collision between 2 colliders (of any type). Returns true if they collide, false if they don't.

arguments.name: response
arguments.description: An empty `Colliders.Response` object. This will be populated with some data about the collision.
